root: ^Press Space to continued Dialogue, but use Mouse to Pick Options
^Slimely bouncing down the road, you stumble across a monster!

main: ^The tension in the air is permeated by your slimey jiggle.

c-0: ^You whip out and lash the minotaur with your slimey tendrils.
c-1: ^ A charitable effort, but slimes don't have vocal chords.

b: ^The fearful minotaur strikes your jelly body with great force. It hurts.
^The minotaur is strong, but his oxen brain does not improve his accuracy as he swings at you and misses.

game_over: ^Defeat doesn't come unexpectedly, I mean you are but a slime... but needless to say the minotaur udderly destroys you. See what I did there?
victory: ^The battle was perilous, but your sliminess has achieved absolute victory!
run_away: ^You got away! Of course a silly minotaur wouldn't be able to keep up with a slime!
